column2: ENGLISH
Every day, the cook chases me out of the kitchen, but not before I've stuffed myself and my pockets full of biscuits.
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I eat far too much and has declared the kitchens off limits!
I had better eat with moderation, or I'll end up looking like my fat nanny...
My [GetFromRelation] is worried about my health and wants me to eat more.
No, you can't have them, they are mine!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] won't have me turn into a 'mean and selfish little moneygrubber'.
If you play with me I'll let you play with my toys.
My [GetFromRelation] told me I should never let my lessers have what is mine... but my friend was just going to borrow some toys!
I hate Latin, I hate History and I won't do my homework!
My [GetFromRelation] is furious at my 'lazy nature' and will keep a closer eye on my studies from now on.
I always do my homework and my chores before I go and play.
My [GetFromRelation] explained to me that I am taking life far too seriously and need to relax.
It's not fair, even peasant children have nicer things than I do!
My [GetFromRelation] gave me a stern talking to about the deadly sin of envy.
Most people have good hearts. A stranger is just a friend I have yet to meet.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] took me over the knee and beat me with a stick for my trusting and weak nature.
That kid mocked me! I cannot be blamed for punching him in the face and giving him a nosebleed...
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is not pleased with my temper. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] gave me the switch!
Let the little fools whisper and snigger behind my back. I can wait... revenge is a dish best served cold.
[From.GetFirstName], my [GetFromRelation], chastised me for my cold patient nature. 'Show some spirit, damn you!' [From.GetSubjectPronoun] shouted.
I stand head and shoulders above the other children, and why should I pretend otherwise?
Today, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] called me an arrogant braggart and told me the story of Icarus and Daedalus.
Why show off, when everything I have, I have been given?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is not impressed with my humility. 'Stand tall when you deserve it', [From.GetSubjectPronoun] explained.
People are so easy to manipulate! A smile, a tear, the right inflection, and they will rush to do my bidding.
My evil [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] promised that for every lie I tell, I'll get a rap from the rod.
I find religion fascinating, especially when the priests talk of heathens and infidels, and how they shall be struck down!
I was reading the [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] when my [GetFromRelation] took it away, telling me to ease off and go outside and play.
I find religion fascinating, especially when the Qur'an talk of heathens and infidels, and how they shall be struck down!
Sometimes, people get upset by my honest opinions. 'Yes, you look fat.' 'You have a big nose.' It's just the truth!
At length, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] lectured me on the necessity of white lies and the virtues of omission.
I don't like climbing trees, I'm afraid of spiders and I won't go near the graveyard. Does that make me a craven?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] talked me into touching a spider today, it was icky and I squealed but didn't run away.
I climb the highest trees, visit the graveyard at midnight and collect spiders and snakes.
One of the snakes bit me this morning. My poor [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] cursed my recklessness and made me promise to stop messing around with vermin.
I can't look a stranger in the eye without blushing or looking down.
When I refused to greet the guests, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] spanked me and locked me in my room without dinner.
Inquisitive, curious and friendly, I always am the first to greet strangers.
I rushed to meet the guests and got to the hall before my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. For that, I earned a spanking.
I'm going to be the bestest ruler ever when I grow up!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] must be jealous, why else would [From.GetSheHe] punish me for being ambitious?
My friends dream of riches, power and fancy things, but I don't even wanna grow up!
My ears are still ringing with my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s harsh words. I need to grow a spine and get some ambition.
I do whatever strikes my fancy. Such as smashing this fine glass goblet!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] took the strap to me for smashing the goblet.
I always make sure the children get equal parts when the cook gives us sweetmeats, full-cream milk or anything else.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] chided me for my obsession with fairness, explaining that justice is simply word invented by human with too much time on their hands.
People are naive fools, laughing, dancing and nodding like puppets to the false tune played by priests and noblemen. Charlatans all!
The priest bored me to tears with a sermon, then told my [GetFromRelation] about my cynicism. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] tried beating it out of me...
People are naive fools, laughing, dancing and nodding like puppets to the false tune played by imams. Charlatans all!
The imam's admonishment bored me to tears, then he told my [GetFromRelation] about my cynicism. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] tried beating it out of me...
I seem to be slow to talk
So where does children come from?
The darkness must definitely contain goblins and demon!
Other children just get into fights with me.
I just do not have enough things to play with.
Other children talk about their mothers, but I never see my mother.
I am rather lonely, the other children does not seem to want to be with me.
Why must I go to school today instead of playing 'Who's afraid of the Black Knight' with my friends?
I really wonder what heathens are. Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
Climbing high walls, and practising sword fighting with my friends are great fun.
I wonder if [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] does exist. Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
Why do people die? Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
Will I rule one day? Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
Life is good, and great parties makes them even better.
I do not understand why we are fighting fellow [catholic.GetName]s?
I wonder why the Church is so rich, and the peasants so poor?
I wonder why [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] let that peasant get away?
Peasants are only good for following my commands!
Deep thoughts interest me, but I would love to hear the answers to some questions.
Since we all are going to die, why not enjoy life?
Serving [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] should be our goal in life. How can I do it the best way?

I snuck out again, found my slim sword Pin and began practising. I'd rather practise sword fighting with Pin than doing embroidery, but I have to watch out so none finds out and takes my sword from me...
I am afraid of so many things, and every time I show my weaknesses others ridicule me for cowardness.

I sneaked through the dungeons, hearing the prisoners pleading for their life and the coarse laughter from the guards. A knife lay forgotten on the floor and I brought it with me, only to realize in the daylight why it had felt so sticky...

I curled up in my favorite chair with the biggest book I could find. When I heard [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] coming up the stairs I sprung from the chair but the book dragged me down and so [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] caught me.
I know I am ugly, I can never be as beautiful as some of the people in the court of [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]!
I always get compliments for my fair skin, my silken hair and my big eyes. They tell me I am beautiful and I should be proud of my looks.

It was market day and I had persuaded [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] to let me have some money for sweetmeats. I found what I wanted but haggled all I could until the merchant gave up, laughed and handed me the sweetmeats for a lot less than what he wanted for them.

Visitors arrived today and, despite their peculiar clothes, strange language and strangely colored skin, they were warmly greeted by [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]. I wanted to talk to them and find out where they came from and who they were, but I was not sure if [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] would approve.

Every chance I get I practice swordfighting, often with the older men who finds it amusing to see me charging at them with all my might. They are too seasoned for me to defeat them, but practise makes perfect and one day I will be the best.
I got my first kiss today! It was not quite what I had expected but rather nice anyway. Too bad [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] blundered in on us, spoiling the moment.
The kitchen is warm and filled with delicious smells and even more delicious foodstuff. If I could, I would spend all my days here.

The biggest tower in [Root.Location.GetName] is staggering high, but I had decided to climb all the way up, on the outside. I saw [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] in the room at the top and shouted a greeting.
I don't feel too good, I am feverish and my head hurts! Can't [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] do something to rid me of this illness?
I have feelings for a [Root.GetManWoman] at court, I feel happy and almost in love everytime I see [Root.GetHerHim]. I try to accept this but will others accept me?
I have never had any problems making friends, to get someone to like me I can twist and turn the truth until it fits.
Haha, look at that rat trying to walk with broken legs! Roly poly little rat!
My ears are still ringing from the slap [From.GetTitledFirstName] gave me over that rat.
Maybe the stablemaster knows more about horses than I do, I'm not that interested anymore anyway.
Women do not interest me, instead I feel drawn to other men.
I know I should not be drawn to other men but I can't seem to help it. Should I deny my feelings and be as the church and world wants me to be?
To lie with another [Root.GetManWoman] as you would lie with a [Root.GetManWomanOpp] is sinful, forbidden and if I was to be exposed, death would be my penalty.
Men do not interest me, instead I feel drawn to other women.
I can run around wild and do whatever I want. Without any guardian, I set my own moral standards!
I know I should not be drawn to other women but I can't seem to help it. Should I deny my feelings and be as the church and world wants me to be?
Mmm, sweets!
But I'm hungry!
Fat people are ugly
I don't want to get fat though.
My toys! Mine!
But... they are MY toys.
I'm nice
I'm confused
I'll just take a nap instead
But I'm tired!
I'm special
[From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is right!
I want what they have!
I still NEED that dress!
They all mean well
I take it back, some people are evil.
I hate him!
I hate [From.GetObjectPronoun] too!
Patience pays off
My temper is rising
It's the truth!
Pride goeth before fall
I see that clearly
Fools, all of them!
I will never lie again! Ouch...!
I want to know more!
Maybe [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is right!
I tell it as I see it
So my tongue won't turn black?
It probably does
I was brave, wasn't I?
It makes me feel alive!
Fine!
I'm a bit shy
I'm starving!
Hi, what's your name?
I hate [From.GetObjectPronoun]!
It is my right!
Mad as a hatter, [From.GetSheHe] is
I am happy with what I have
Where can I get that?
Music to my ears!
I see that it was wrong now
It has to be fair
Perhaps [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is right...
It is all pointless!
It worked
Maybe someone will notice it.
Maybe my father will tell me?
Help me!
Maybe my father notices it.
Maybe father will give me more toys.
Maybe father knows..
It is probably no big deal.
My will should count for more...
I'll ask [Root.Guardian.GetHerHim]!
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] would surely agree!
I'll ask [Root.Guardian.GetHerHim]!
I'll go ask [Root.Guardian.GetHerHim]!
I should ask [Root.Guardian.GetHerHim]!
Maybe I should invite [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] to one of them?
Perhaps [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows why?
I'll go and ask [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]!
I'll go and ask [Root.Guardian.GetHerHim]!
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] will surely agree!
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] will help me out!
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] will know what to do...
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] will know what to do...
I was not careful enough, [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] saw me!
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName], please make them stop!
Ew! Blood!
Let me go! I wanna read!
Why am I not beautiful?
I am the fairest of them all!
It was a sweet deal
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName], may I talk to the visitors?
Isn't that right, [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]?
You ruined everything!
I wanna become a cook!
[Root.Guardian.GetSheHeCap] didn't look too happy
Please, help me!
Do you accept me for who I am, [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]?
It's a great skill, isn't it, [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]?
Perhaps a cat next...
I guess I deserved it
I need a new hobby. Oh, a bible!
I like them more
No!
I will be careful...
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] may have other opinions?
I still NEED that wooden sword!
Fine...
I... cannot risk it
[This.GetFullName] will look at my behavior.
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] saw [Root.GetFirstName] practise swordfighting
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] is told about [Root.GetFirstName]'s trouble
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] saw [Root.GetFirstName] with the bloody knife
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] caught [Root.GetFirstName] reading instead of doing [Root.GetHerHis] chores
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] comforts [Root.GetFirstName]
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] worries about [Root.GetFirstName]
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] saw [Root.GetFirstName] haggle with the merchant
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] responds to [Root.GetFirstName]'s question.
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] approves of [Root.GetFirstName]'s swordfighting
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] realizes [Root.GetFirstName] is becoming a [Root.GetManWoman]
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] finds [Root.GetFirstName] in the kitchen
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] deals with [Root.GetFirstName]'s curiosity
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] is troubled by [Root.GetFirstName]'s illness
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] realizes [Root.GetFirstName] is drawn to a [Root.GetManWoman]
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] has something to say about [Root.GetFirstName]'s way of getting friends
[Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] is questioned about [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes [Root.Religion.GetName]
[Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] is questioned about Allah
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] practically lives in the kitchens, the little glutton!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] hardly eats anything for fear of turning fat.
I watched my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] at play with another child yesterday and noticed that [From.GetSheHe] didn't want to share [From.GetHerHis] toys.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is a charitable little rascal, [From.GetSheHe] just gave [From.GetHerHis] newest toy to the smith's son.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is not exerting [From.GetReflexivePronoun] in [From.GetPossPronoun] studies. I am starting to despair.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] does [From.GetHerHis] homework and is always on time for [From.GetHerHis] lessons.
I had to break up a fight between my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] and another child today. [From.GetFirstName]'s heart is filled with envy...
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has a tender and loving soul, trusting everyone in the castle. I fear [From.GetSheHe] will get hurt someday.
The cook complained to me about my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s temper tantrums. Apparently [From.GetSubjectPronoun] punched her son in the face. Again.
Patience is a virtue, but sometimes it gets on my nerves. My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] never loses [From.GetPossPronoun] temper, always waiting patiently for a chance to retaliate.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] is turning into an arrogant little braggart. I might have to rein [From.GetHerHim] in a bit.
I caught my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName] lying to me again, straight to my face without batting an eye. I almost had an innocent servant sent to the stocks!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is modest and humble, never showing off or bragging.
My little [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] always has [From.GetPossPronoun] nose in the scriptures, and spends all [From.GetPossPronoun] time among the priests.
My little [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] always has [From.GetHerHis] nose in the Qur'an, and spends all [From.GetHerHis] time among the imams.
The lady almost ran me down as I entered the hall. Tearfully she told me that my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] had insulted her again.
The smallest spider makes my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] squeal and run for cover. This has started to worry me.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] was bitten by a snake this morning! The brave little fool keeps seeking out danger.
Every time my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] meets a stranger, [From.GetSheHe] looks like [From.GetSheHe] might faint.
When guests arrive, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is the first to greet them and shower them with questions.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is aiming for the stars, the ambitious little brat.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] lacks all passion and ambition, perfectly content with [From.GetHerHis] lot in life.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is impulsive and seems unable to tell right from wrong. What should I do with my wayward [GetFromRelation]?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] makes sure everyone gets exactly the same amount of whatever sweets the cook gives the children.
I fear my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is too cynical for [From.GetHerHis] age.
I caught my young ward [From.GetTitledFirstName] torturing a rat behind the stables today...
We have children at the court that has no guardian handling their education. They run a risk of becoming spoiled brats.
Heh, eat and be merry child!
Temperance is a virtue!
This is how children learn thrift!
[From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is turning out well!
[From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is just dense. What can I do?
[From.GetSubjectPronounCap] has a good mentor!
The other children are just selfish
Those who love get love in return!
The kid shows spirit!
Good, I cannot abide recklessness
No, [From.GetSheHe] has reason to be proud
Quietly encourage [From.GetFirstName]
Even I am impressed
Such a bright little child!
But, my dear lady, you ARE fat!
Spiders? I can't abide them either!
That's my [From.GetLadLass]!
The [From.GetLadLass] is just a bit shy
This child clearly has potential.
That is only right
It suits [From.GetHerHis] position
How about a pat on the head?
I am proud of [From.GetObjectPronoun]!
[From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is clear-sighted.
Let the [From.GetLadLass] have [From.GetPossPronoun] fun!
I guess I have to take care of it myself then.
Birch [From.GetHerHim]!
Hold up [From.GetFirstName] as an example for the court!
[From.GetSheHeCap] needs the birch!
Praise [From.GetHerHim] publicly!
Beat [From.GetHerHim] into action!
Praise [From.GetObjectPronoun] in front of the court.
Beat some respect into [From.GetHerHim]!
Show everyone how virtuous [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is.
Beat [From.GetHerHim] into being calm!
Hold up [From.GetFirstName] as an example for the court!
That will be cured by the birch.
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [From.GetFirstName]'s virtues!
With the birch, [From.GetSheHe] will speak the truth!
I will not raise a zealot!
Praise [From.GetHerHis] honesty to the court.
Some fears are good, but there are limits
Praise [From.GetHerHis] bravery to everyone!
Shyness can be cured by the birch!
Introduce [From.GetHerHim] to everyone at court!
Ambition will not serve [From.GetObjectPronoun]
That will not do!
It's the strap for [From.GetObjectPronoun]!
Time to explain how the world works
Nothing the strap won't cure!
With the birch, [From.GetSheHe] will learn better!
It is not my concern...
Talk to [From.GetHerHim] about moderation.
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [From.GetFirstName]'s virtues!
[From.GetSheHeCap] needs a lecture on charity!
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [From.GetFirstName]'s virtues!
Talk to [From.GetHerHim] about being diligent
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [From.GetFirstName]'s virtues!
Talk to [From.GetHerHim] about kindness
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [From.GetFirstName]'s virtues!
Encourage [From.GetHerHim] to be more patient
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [From.GetFirstName]'s virtues!
Tell [From.GetHerHim], 'Pride goeth before fall'
That's no way to get ahead!
Talk to [From.GetHerHim] about honesty
Tell [From.GetFirstName] that honesty has its bounds...
Fear is the mind killer
Caution must temper courage
Shyness is a terrible curse, I'll talk with [From.GetHerHim].
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] isn't shy!
Talk to [From.GetHerHim] about kindness
Pray [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will save [From.GetHerHim]!
[From.GetSubjectPronounCap] must learn to enjoy life!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] will save [From.GetHerHim] from Hell!!!
Charity is for naive weaklings!
Pray for [From.GetHerHis] soul!
The child needs to lighten up!
Envy is the deadliest of sins!
Tender soul? I'll give [From.GetObjectPronoun] a tender back!
Pray for [From.GetHerHis] soul!
I'll bring out the fire in [From.GetObjectPronoun]!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] will cure [From.GetHerHim] of [From.GetHerHis] sin!
Pray that [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will show [From.GetHerHim] the light
Punish [From.GetHerHim] for [From.GetHerHis] insults.
Pray that [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will provide strength
The child is annoying!
Pray for [From.GetHerHis] soul!
I woke up last night in a cold sweat, heart pounding with fear at the realization I must someday die...
[From.GetFirstName], my young [GetFromRelation], wants to know what it is all about. Why are we here on this Earth?
My [GetFromRelation] has answered all my existential questions.
I find myself speaking and acting more and more like my guardian.
I have taught my young [GetFromRelation] well. [From.GetFirstName] is starting to act properly [Root.Culture.GetName]!
[From.GetFirstName] is slow to learn to talk.
[From.GetFirstName] asks, 'Daddy, where do children come from?'
[From.GetFirstName] is afraid of the dark.
[From.GetFirstName] is often involved in fights with other toddlers
[From.GetFirstName] is not satisfied, and keeps asking for more toys to play with.
[From.GetFirstName] asks, 'Daddy, Where is Mom?'
[From.GetFirstName] has trouble making friends
[From.GetFirstName] wants to play with friends instead of studying.
[From.GetFirstName] asks, 'Where do heathens come from?'
[From.GetFirstName] is often playing very daring games with other children
[From.GetFirstName] asks, 'Does [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] exist?'
[From.GetFirstName] asks, 'Why do people die?'
[From.GetFirstName] asks, 'Will I rule one day?'
[From.GetFirstName] has developed a habit for wild parties.
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'If we're [catholic.GetName] and our enemies are [catholic.GetName], why are we fighting?'
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'Why is the church so rich when the peasants are starving and poor?'
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'Why did you let off that peasant accused from poaching?'
[From.GetFirstName] says 'These peasants we have are all mine to command like little slaves, right?'
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'If a tree falls in the woods and there's nobody there to hear it, does it make a noise?'
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'Since we all die anyway, why to be so hassled about life?'
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'How can I best serve the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith?'
[From.GetFullName] was supposed to work on her embroidery but she clearly fancied another kind of Pin. Her swordsmanship was not too bad, for a girl.

The ones who ridicule [From.GetFirstName] for [From.GetHerHis] weaknesses are getting more and more scornful. Their escalating ridicule has made [From.GetFirstName] unable to ignore it anymore, [From.GetSheHe] begged me to help [From.GetHerHim].
My heart missed a beat when I saw [From.GetFirstName] emerge from the dungeons, covered in grime and with a bloody knife in [From.GetHerHis] hand.

I knew exactly where I would find [From.GetFirstName] when [From.GetSheHe] did not show up for practice, in the library in [From.GetHerHis] favorite chair and with the biggest book [From.GetSheHe] could find.
If you would compare the fairest courtier and [From.GetFirstName], then the courtier would a beautiful swan and [From.GetFirstName] a ugly toad.
[From.GetFirstName]'s hair, fair skin and beautiful big eyes will make life easier for [From.GetHerHim] than if [From.GetSheHe] had been ugly.

[From.GetFirstName] is always counting money and makes sure [From.GetSheHe] get the most out of it. [From.GetSheHeCap] haggled with a merchant over some sweetmeats until the merchant laughed with frustration and handed over the sweetmeats for a lot less than he had asked for.

[From.GetFirstName] was curious about the visitors but was polite enough to wait until the chamberlain had escorted them to their rooms before [From.GetSheHe] started asking thousands of questions about them, where they came from, why they looked so different and who they were.
If [From.GetFirstName] is nowhere to be seen, you can always find [From.GetHerHim] in the courtyard, playing with [From.GetHerHis] swords and practising [From.GetHerHis] swordfighting with older men.
I opened the stable door a bit quick and accidently stumbled in on [From.GetFirstName] getting [From.GetHerHis] first kiss! I suddenly realized [From.GetFirstName] is becoming a [From.GetManWoman].

The kitchen is truly a wonderful place, filled with delicious things and smells, but it worries me that [From.GetFirstName] spends all [From.GetHerHis] time here, when [From.GetSheHe] should be practicing swordfighting and learning how to rule.

I was... inspecting the damage to the highest tower in [From.Location.GetName] when the head of [From.GetFirstName] appeared outside the window, fifty metres above ground. What should I do with this curious child?
[From.GetFirstName]'s fever has risen and [From.GetSheHe] complains about a headache. I worry about [From.GetHerHim] but there's not much I can do.
Every time [From.GetFirstName] looks at that [From.GetManWoman], I get a sinking feeling in my stomach. [From.GetSheHeCap] might be attracted to persons of the same sex as [From.GetSheHe]!
The twists and turns of [From.GetFirstName]'s tongue and the white lies [From.GetSheHe] uses to make friends is making my head spin. How can such a young [From.GetLadLass] be able to lie so well?
Ask my guardian about [Root.Guardian.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
Make [From.GetObjectPronoun] a proper [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]
The [From.Religion.GetName] Faith gives me peace of mind
I suppose I am getting cultured.
What a bright child!
